attributes.action: To ask the queen to dissolve parliament and call a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the House of Commons is unwilling or unable to reform itself and due to the action of MPs over pay and expenses the public should now be given the right to vote out those MP's who have abused their position of trust

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
